meanings.definition: A white fur used for trimming garments.
meanings.sent1: The princess wore a cloak with delicate miniver trim.
meanings.sent2: The coat had a luxurious miniver collar.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with a scrap of miniver fur.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as soft as miniver against the winter wind.
meanings.sent5: The miniver fur gleamed in the sunlight, adding elegance to her outfit.

meanings.definition: A garment trimmed with miniver fur.
meanings.sent1: He admired the miniver-trimmed cape in the shop window.
meanings.sent2: The miniver coat kept her warm on the chilly evening.
meanings.sent3: The miniver fur on his hat made him look like a nobleman.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as cozy as a miniver-lined cloak.
meanings.sent5: The miniver garment stood out in the sea of plain attire.
